WRITING.TEXT: If you feel comfortable enough racially abusing people and not expect a reaction like this once in a while then that #8217;s your problem
Are you from England by any chance? I #8217;m black IRL and as a kid I got called a paki on several occasions. It can be used as a blanket term for people of colour by racists in this country

Don #8217;t know if you #8217;re from England or not but yeah it was always funny getting called a paki by people when I am from Jamaica haha It really wasn #8217;t even worth the breath of saying #8220;I #8217;m not Pakistani #8221; to be quite honest

That #8217;s a fair stance and yeah you guessed right I am on the lighter shade of black, I #8217;m from Jamaica but my mother is Irish and I live in England. When I got called a paki as a kid it wasn #8217;t really worth a response given the distance between Pakistan and Jamaica Lol I got this from Twitter and it said it was a black man so that #8217;s why the title says that and I don #8217;t agree with what you said at the end there about instances like this creating more racists Whether you are on the right or the left I think most rational people on both sides can agree that the man in this video deserves no sympathy

I hear what you #8217;re saying but I think there #8217;s a difference between holding racist beliefs and ideologies in your own right and racially abusing someone in the street and calling them a #8220;paki #8221; or whatever insult it may be. It #8217;s a form of assault (verbal) and also a hate crime and don #8217;t be surprised if you get a punch in the face from someone as a retaliation to said racial abuse
Why is he entitled to be an asshole but he #8217;s not entitled to retaliate?
Ummm, this isn #8217;t a BLM video
Wait so racially abusing someone in the street is not illegal now? When did this change?
I still can #8217;t believe people thought the knockout was staged
So you #8217;re saying he took the punch and let Canelo knock him out at the end?

I think if you think that fight was fake I question whether you have been in a ring before If you have watched a lot of boxing you #8217;ll know that boxers can get frozen on the big stage out or just can #8217;t land because they don #8217;t want to get countered and many other reasons. Some recent examples: Broner v Pac, Quigg v Frampton, Wilder v Fury 2 etc

Some of these comments like the one you have just posted here are really sad No acknowledgement of the racial abuse and instead having a problem with the consequences he faced for verbal assault and a hate crime

You don #8217;t have to hit harder to be wary of counters, Canelo is one of the best in the game right now at counters and head movement, he can turn a fight into a real chess match. PS: why are you so angry dude? Calm down, you #8217;re raging over boxing on the internet bro Lol
Dude calm down LOL there is no need to be upset I #8217;m sure if Canelo was in the same room as you that you both would get along fine :-)
